column4: guys, has anyone experience with linux mint? Is it really thousand times better than ubuntu?
it is slightly better configured at the start... nice color scheme, smaller interface, comes with gnome-do and some codecs.... but that is like 10 min to fix in ubuntu, if it comes to that
well i think i am gonna try it
bad news... it takes a nasty hack to free firefox from the ugly "custom" mint search results page that gives them money per hit
